format: A data frame with 463 observations on the following 23 variables.
reference:
Daniel S. Hamermesh, Amy Parker, Beauty in the classroom:
instructorsâ pulchritude and putative pedagogical productivity, Economics
of Education Review, Volume 24, Issue 4, 2005.
doi:10.1016/j.econedurev.2004.07.013.
title: Professor evaluations and beauty
description:
Description
The data are gathered from end of semester student evaluations for 463 courses
taught by a sample of 94 professors from the University of Texas at Austin. In addition,
six students rate the professors' physical appearance. The result is a data
frame where each row contains a different course and each column has
information on the course and the professor who taught that course.

parameters.rank: Rank of professor: teaching, tenure track, tenured.
parameters.score:
Average professor evaluation score: (1) very unsatisfactory -
(5) excellent.
parameters.prof_id: Variable identifying the professor who taught the course (out of 94 professors).
parameters.cls_perc_eval: Percent of students in class who completed evaluation.
parameters.cls_students: Total number of students in class.
parameters.bty_f2upper:
Beauty rating of professor from second level female:
(1) lowest - (10) highest.
parameters.bty_m2upper:
Beauty rating of professor from second upper level male:
(1) lowest - (10) highest.
parameters.cls_did_eval: Number of students in class who completed evaluation.
parameters.bty_f1upper:
Beauty rating of professor from upper level female:
(1) lowest - (10) highest.
parameters.course_id: Variable identifying the course (out of 463 courses).
parameters.pic_color: Color of professor's picture: color, black & white.
parameters.ethnicity: Ethnicity of professor: not minority, minority.
parameters.pic_outfit: Outfit of professor in picture: not formal, formal.
parameters.bty_m1upper:
Beauty rating of professor from upper level male:
(1) lowest - (10) highest.
parameters.cls_profs:
Number of professors teaching sections in course in
sample: single, multiple.
parameters.bty_m1lower:
Beauty rating of professor from lower level male:
(1) lowest - (10) highest.
parameters.language:
Language of school where professor received education:
English or non-English.
parameters.cls_credits:
Number of credits of class: one credit (lab, PE, etc.),
multi credit.
parameters.bty_f1lower:
Beauty rating of professor from lower level
female: (1) lowest - (10) highest.
